version_description:
・Enables Pre market stock quotes.
・Enables After market stock quotes.
・Enhances Streaming Quote Clock.
・Improves user interface.

・Enables Pre market stock quotes.
・Enables After market stock quotes.
・Enhances Streaming Quote Clock.
・Improves user interface.
. Updates user interface for iOS7
. Updates user interface for iOS7

We have added many exciting features, including advanced stock quotes, multi chart view, stock sector view, auto refresh quotes, customized app opening view, improved stock charts, and so on. Please enjoy this update and don't forget to give it a thumb up in the App Store. :) Thank you.

1. Real-Time advanced stock quotes. Now you can view much-faster quotes and more in-depth information like bid, ask, bid size, ask size, volume, company names, etc.

2. Powerful multi chart view. With one tap, you can quickly view a list of stock charts. Plus, you can customize technical indicators, data range, and chart type for those charts.

3. Customized app opening view. Users can choose their default app opening view. In addition, you are able to use a specific watch-list as the landing view.

4. Improves stock charts to include current day data (daily chart) during regular hours when users designate a long date range.

5. Improves user interface.

We have added many exciting features, including advanced stock quotes, multi chart view, stock sector view, auto refresh quotes, customized app opening view, improved stock charts, and so on. Please enjoy this update and don't forget to give it a thumb up in the App Store. :) Thank you.

1. Real-Time advanced stock quotes. Now you can view much-faster quotes and more in-depth information like bid, ask, bid size, ask size, volume, company names, etc.

2. Powerful multi chart view. With one tap, you can quickly view a list of stock charts. Plus, you can customize technical indicators, data range, and chart type for those charts.

3. Customized app opening view. Users can choose their default app opening view. In addition, you are able to use a specific watch-list as the landing view.

4. Improves stock charts to include current day data (daily chart) during regular hours when users designate a long date range.

5. Improves user interface.

1. Adds Push Notification for Price Alert. Set alerts based on prices and receive push notifications when the target prices and conditions are reached. Additionally, your alerts are automatically sync to the cloud.
2. Cloud Sync -
. Many of our users use iPhone, iPad, iPad mini, and iPod. Now you can easily and quickly sync your Watch-list among multiple iOS devices. Sign up an account with this app and conveniently backup your watch-lists with one simple tap. Later, just sign in your account on another device and easily restore data any any time.
3. Passcode / Touch ID protected app access -
. For users who don’t want their watch-lists and private financial information to be accidentally or incautiously presented to others (e.g. when kids are playing parents’ phones, friends are using your iPads, etc) will feel safer. You can conveniently enable passcode protection for the app, set a 4-digit-number code, and use Touch ID to unlock. Whenever you launch the app or switch back to the app, you need to authenticate. You can choose to turn on / off the passcode protection any time. (Note: please be sure to remember your passcode. If you forget it and there’s no Touch ID available, you need to delete the app completely and re-install it.)
4. Sets the default quote type for each individual watch-list. View either change or change % by default.
5. Adds "3 months" in the date range selection of the stock chart and advanced stock chart.
6. Other improvement -
. Improves calendar date selection.
. Improves stock chart to include current day data (daily chart) during regular hours when you designate a long date range.
. Adds "Clear Cache" feature to address a rate symbol mismatch issue.
. Reduces binary size and optimizes for 64-bit support.

If you like our effort making this app better, please don't forget to give us a thumb up in the App Store. It really means a lot to us. Thank you.

If you like our effort making this app better, please don't forget to give us a thumb up in the App Store. It really means a lot to us. Thank you.

. Add note feature. Users can create general notes or notes of stocks.
. Update user interface.

. Add note feature. Users can create general notes or notes of stocks.
. Update user interface.

. Enhances note feature. Users can create general notes or notes of stocks.
. Improves user interface.
. Adds FAQ section.

. Enhances note feature. Users can create general notes or notes of stocks.
. Improves user interface.
. Adds FAQ section.

. Enhances personalized research notes with sentiment and trend. You could easily write multiple notes, either for specific stocks or for the general purpose and quickly compare your sentiment about the stock with the stock's actual trend at one glance.
. Adds aggregated news.
. Update user interface.

. Enhances personalized research notes with sentiment and trend. You could easily write multiple notes, either for specific stocks or for the general purpose and quickly compare your sentiment about the stock with the stock's actual trend at one glance.
. Adds aggregated news.
. Update user interface.

. Adds support to market index charts.
. Supports buy / sell equities through Tradier Brokerage.
. Enhances notes feature.
. Improves watch-list view showing both quote change and change %.
. Continues to improve user interface and native support for 6s and 6s Plus.

If you like our effort making this app better, please don't forget to give us a thumb up in the App Store. It really means a lot to us. :) Thank you.

. Adds support to market index charts.
. Supports buy / sell equities through Tradier Brokerage.
. Enhances notes feature.
. Improves watch-list view showing both quote change and change %.
. Continues to improve user interface and native support for 6s and 6s Plus.

If you like our effort making this app better, please don't forget to give us a thumb up in the App Store. It really means a lot to us. :) Thank you.

We recently enabled placing trade orders right after research in 5Min Chart through collaboration with Tradier Brokerage. Now this version is even better with landscape orientation re-enabled and more user interface improvement. Hope you enjoy and feel free to let us know your thoughts.

We recently enabled placing trade orders right after research in 5Min Chart through collaboration with Tradier Brokerage. Now this version is even better with landscape orientation re-enabled and more user interface improvement. Hope you enjoy and feel free to let us know your thoughts.

. Adds Dark and Green color themes to Advanced Stock Chart.
. Able to customize the text size of the coordinates on the Advanced Stock Chart.
. Able to set the space between the bars on Advanced Chart and the chart borders.
. Continues to improve user interface.

Follow us on Facebook and Twitter for more.:)
https://www.facebook.com/stockstation
https://twitter.com/minteractapp

. Enhance Advanced Stock Chart with Pivot Point, Dark & Green color themes, adjustable text size, border space, etc.
. Overall improvement.

. Enhance Advanced Stock Chart with Pivot Point, Dark & Green color themes, adjustable text size, border space, etc.
. Overall improvement.

Happy 2017! We are actively improving our app with new features.
1. View stock quotes in up to 4 decimal places in Watchlist and "Research" view. Great for penny stocks and bonds.
2. Better layout for OHLC quotes in Watchlist and Research.
3. You can choose to remember login when signing in your 5Min Chart account.
4. Add YouTube Channel link in "More" tab.
5. Overall improvement.

Hope you enjoy. Please don't forget to follow us on Facebook and Twitter for more. Thank you.
https://twitter.com/minteractapp
https://www.facebook.com/stockstation

We are actively developing our app with new features. Hope you like them.:)
1. Optimize quotes in the watchlist.
2. Add Intelligent Stock Ratings under "Research". (for subscribers)
3. Improve support message chat.
4. Choose to remember login when signing in your 5MinChart account.
5.. Fix an issue of company name mismatch in Watchlist. (Please go to "Me" tab -> "Settings" and click "Clear Cache" first).
6. Overall improvement.

We are actively developing our app with new features. Hope you like them.:)
1. Optimize quotes in the watchlist.
2. Add Intelligent Stock Ratings under "Research". (for subscribers)
3. Improve support message chat.
4. Choose to remember login when signing in your 5MinChart account.
5.. Fix an issue of company name mismatch in Watchlist. (Please go to "Me" tab -> "Settings" and click "Clear Cache" first).
6. Overall improvement.

We are actively developing our apps and bringing you new features and enhancements.
1. Support cryptocurrency in Watchlist, including $$BTC (Bitcoin), $$ETH (Ethereum) and $$LTC (Litecoin).
2. Add $$BTC (Bitcoin) historical daily chart.
3. Add weekly support in Advanced Stock Chart (default is daily).
4. Improve news.
5. Add "Account Verification" in "Account". Please don't forget to verify your account email to make full use of the features in the app.
6. Overall improvement.

We are actively developing our apps and bringing you new features and enhancements.
1. Support cryptocurrency in Watchlist, including $$BTC (Bitcoin), $$ETH (Ethereum) and $$LTC (Litecoin).
2. Add $$BTC (Bitcoin) historical daily chart.
3. Add weekly support in Advanced Stock Chart (default is daily).
4. Improve news.
5. Add "Account Verification" in "Account". Please don't forget to verify your account email to make full use of the features in the app.
6. Overall improvement.

Latest Updates:
. Enhance "FA Score". Besides the score, you can also check the values of several FA indicators like P/E, P/B, P/S, ROA, ROE, ROIC, D/E, Gross Margin, EBITDA Margin, Net Margin, etc. Know the good and the bad of the indicators.
. Overall improvement.

Recent Updates:
. Personalize "Market Bar" in the top section of "Home" tab with stocks you like to watch. Just go to "Me" tab -> "Settings" and do the customization. Quickly view stock charts by tapping the market bar.
. Add "Alert History" in "Alert" tab. View various alert push notifications previously received.
. Now you can set your stock notes as public or private notes, so you could share the wisdom.
. Add "Shared Notes" and you can post public notes directly in "Shared Notes".
. You can create multiple smart watch-lists. Smart Watchlist automatically syncs across devices and you could receive intelligent alerts for stocks in your smart watch-lists.
. Add "FA Score" for stocks. We analyze hundreds of fundamental indicators and many pieces of information of a stock and generate FA scores for the stock and its relative strength in the overall market.
. Add "TA Score" for stocks. Our smart system automatically performs a technical analysis everyday and generates a diagnostic report based on many indicators. You can check the overall TA strength of a stock, plus breakdown scores of different categories.
. Easily view FA Scores (fundamental analysis score) and TA Scores (technical analysis score) of all stocks in a watch-list or smart watch-list with one-tap. Know the strengths and weaknesses of your watchlist.
. Add "Top Stocks of FA Score" scan.
. Add "Top Stocks of TA Score" scan.

. Add Smart Watchlist, which automatically syncs across devices and sends various intelligent alerts.
. Support cryptocurrency in Watchlist, including Bitcoin ($$BTC), Ethereum ($$ETH), and Litecoin ($$LTC).
. Add Bitcoin historical daily chart.
. Add weekly support in Advanced Stock Chart (default is daily).
. Optimize "Market News".
. Optimize for iOS 11 and iPhone X.

Latest Updates:
. Enhance "FA Score". Besides the score, you can also check the values of several FA indicators like P/E, P/B, P/S, ROA, ROE, ROIC, D/E, Gross Margin, EBITDA Margin, Net Margin, etc. Know the good and the bad of the indicators.
. Overall improvement.

Latest Updates:
1. Personalize "Market Bar" in the top section of "Home" tab with stocks you like to watch. Just go to "Me" tab -> "Settings" and do the customization. Quickly view stock charts by tapping the market bar.
2. Add "Alert History" in "Alert" tab. View various alert push notifications previously received.
3. Now you can set your stock notes as public or private notes, so you could share the wisdom.
4. Add "Message Board" and you can post public notes directly in "Message Board".
5. You can create multiple smart watch-lists. Smart Watchlist automatically syncs across devices and you could receive intelligent alerts for stocks in your smart watch-lists. (advanced plan)
6. Add "FA Score" for stocks. We analyze hundreds of fundamental indicators and many pieces of information of a stock and generate FA scores for the stock and its relative strength in the overall market. (advanced plan)
7. Add "TA Score" for stocks. Our smart system automatically performs a technical analysis everyday and generates a diagnostic report based on many indicators. You can check the overall TA strength of a stock, plus breakdown scores of different categories. (advanced plan)
8. Easily view FA Scores (fundamental analysis score) and TA Scores (technical analysis score) of all stocks in a watch-list or smart watch-list with one-tap. Know the strengths and weaknesses of your watchlist. (advanced plan)
9. Add "Top Stocks of FA Score". Scan and view the stocks with top fundamental analysis score of all US market, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, NYSE, and AMEX. (advanced plan)
10. Add "Top Stocks of TA Score". Scan and view the stocks with top technical analysis scores of all US market, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, NYSE, and AMEX. Tap each stock to see more details. (advanced plan)
11. Improve the speed and overall performance.
12. Optimize for iPhone XS, XS Max, XR and iOS 12.

Recent Updates:
. Add Smart Watchlist, which automatically syncs across devices and sends various intelligent alerts.
. Support nearly 2,000 cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin ($$BTC), Ethereum ($$ETH), Litecoin ($$LTC), Ripple ($$XRP), EOS ($$EOS), Bitcoin Cash ($$BCH), and many more.
. Add cryptocurrency historical daily chart.
. Add weekly support in Advanced Stock Chart (default is daily).

Latest Updates:
1. Enhance symbol auto completion in "Research" tab. This feature gives some suggestions based on what you input. Those are just suggestions. If you don't see a stock you are looking for, that does not mean the stock cannot be found. As long as you enter the correct symbol, you could tap the blue "Go" button on the keyboard and proceed to the stock detail view.
2. Continue to improve the speed and overall performance.
3. Continue to optimize for iPhone XS, XS Max, XR and iOS 12.
